00061 void Bus::SetLinks()
00062 {
00063     for(short i=0; i<NO_OF_CHANNELS; i++)
00064     {
00065         dataBus[i].parent = this;
00066         cmdBus[i].parent = this;
00067         dataBus[i].child1 = (Component*)(&((DRAM*)child1)->dc[i]);      // dram side link
00068         dataBus[i].child2 = (Component*)child2;                                 // response side link   
00069         cmdBus[i].child = (Component*)(&((DRAM*)child1)->dc[i]);
00070     }   
00071 }
